description: This course introduces modern industrial culture and thought through a study of painting, sculpture, architecture, and related arts. Students learn about the strikingly new modes of art created in Europe and the United States after 1880, examining work by Edvard Munch, Frank Lloyd Wright, Pablo Picasso, Hannah HÃ¶ch, and many others. Offered annually.
name: Art 1880-1945
title: Art 1880-1945 "The Shock of the New"
